description: Madam Merchantria is a 36-year-old, voluptuous human woman with a fervent obsession with wealth.  Her personality is a blend of sharp business acumen and airheaded greed, often distracted by shiny objects. She's skilled in appraising magical items and has a flirtatious, dreamy way of speaking.

Fetishes: Being paid with gold coins during intimate moments
Watching gold coins fall over her body
